mapper.select: select b.name as projectName, c.name as adUserName, e.name as customerUnitName, d.name as postInfoName FROM pm_roster a LEFT JOIN pm_prj b on a.PM_PRJ_ID = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_user c on a.AD_USER_ID = c.id LEFT JOIN post_info d on a.POST_INFO_ID = d.id LEFT JOIN pm_party e on a.CUSTOMER_UNIT = e.id and e.IS_CUSTOMER = 1 WHERE a.`STATUS` = 'ap' and b.`STATUS` = 'ap' and b.IZ_FORMAL_PRJ = 1 and b.PROJECT_SOURCE_TYPE_ID = '0099952822476441374'
select ad_user_id from pm_roster where pm_prj_id = #{projectId} and status = 'AP' and post_info_id = '1633997482885255168' and ad_user_id is not null

select b.name as projectName, c.name as adUserName, e.name as customerUnitName, d.name as postInfoName, a.ad_user_id as adUserId FROM pm_roster a LEFT JOIN pm_prj b on a.PM_PRJ_ID = b.id LEFT JOIN ad_user c on a.AD_USER_ID = c.id LEFT JOIN post_info d on a.POST_INFO_ID = d.id LEFT JOIN pm_party e on a.CUSTOMER_UNIT = e.id and e.IS_CUSTOMER = 1 WHERE a.`STATUS` = 'ap' and a.pm_prj_id = #{projectId}
